comment.author: 69587809@N05
comment._content: This is The Butler Arms Hotel, showing the public bar entrance from the Main Street of Waterville, Co Kerry.  It existed as an inn in 1858 and was a hotel in 1884.  The picture from the Lawrence Collection is surely after that date.  A picture of the hotel facing the sea is in a Wikipedia article titled The Butler Arms Hotel.  Many of its famous guests are named in the article.

comment.author: 69587809@N05
comment._content: It is worth mentioning that the Lawrence Collection has several quality pictures from this area

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/69587809@N05] Thanks. Have tagged this image with info from your comment...  :)

comment.author: 79549245@N06
comment._content: James Butler memorial Fountain was erected in 1889 so the photo above is definitely after that date. See Dictionary of irish Architects [http://www.flickr.com/photos/alan-travels/6116642450/]
